name: Commute Crash
description:
Commute Crash

Congratulations. Once again you are late to your tedious job. You can already hear your boss Graham give you the same ol' run down on why it is unprofessional to be turning up to the office late as usual. But this time it will be different. You remember that this is your last strike, and that "unless you have a good enough excuse" you will end up fired for turning up after 9. Unfortunately, a good excuse is something you must have left in your other jacket, but you might be able to come up with one.

Whether it is getting hit by a car or slipping on a banana peel. The aim of commute crash is to find as many excuses for why you are late as possible to convince your boss not to fire you. Delaying your venture to work with casualties will be the only way to have a good enough reason on why your late, but make sure not to get to work after your shift ends.

This game was made during the 2018 Brains Eden Game Jam within 48 hours. The theme of the game was "Unreliable" and we felt that an unreliable worker was a perfect protagonist for the player to take control of.

Controls for the game (Requires Controller):

Left Thumbstick - Moves Character

L/R Triggers - Moves Camera

X - Selects Menu Option
